Sql.query: select (select b.emprnomb from vw_si_empresa b where b.emprcodi=a.emprcodi) as EMPRESA, (select c.vtranetotal from trn_valor_trans_empresa c where c.emprcodi= a.emprcodi and c.pericodi=a.pericodi and c.vtraneversion=a.vtotemversion) as VALORIZACION, (select sum(d.ingcomimporte) from TRN_ING_COMPENSACION d where d.emprcodi=a.emprcodi and d.PERICODI = a.pericodi and d.INGCOMVERSION = a.vtotemversion ) as COMPENSACION , (select f.ingpotimporte from trn_ing_potencia f where f.emprcodi=a.emprcodi and f.pericodi = a.pericodi and f.ingpotversion = a.vtotemversion) as IP, (select e.SALEMPSALDO from TRN_SALDO_EMPRESA e where e.emprcodi=a.emprcodi and e.pericodi=a.pericodi and e.salempversion=a.vtotemversion) as SALDOTRANSMISION, a.VTOTEMTOTAL from trn_valor_total_empresa a where a.pericodi= :pericodi and a.vtotemversion = :vtotemversion
